artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: N/E; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: See individual pieces. White and cream warp and weft. Loose weave. Periodic, double, thick wefts form pattern. Wefts of many different threads including a chenille-type. Mostly wool. Notes on face of card: "not so white", $16 yd tboth edges. (white, cream)
